<section>
<para>
<partintro>
 <para>This chapter covers the following topics:</para>
<itemizedlist>
<listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Manage_Your_Portals.Manage_Permission">Manage permissions</link>
          </emphasis> instructs you how to set permissions on a portal, page, category and portlet.</para>
        </listitem>
<listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Manage_Your_Portals.Manage_sites">Manage sites</link>
          </emphasis> gives steps on how to create/edit/delete a portal, and how  to switch between various portals.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Manage_Your_Portals.Manage_Navigation_Nodes">Manage navigation nodes</link>
          </emphasis> includes actions which can be done on a navigation, such as adding/editing/copying/pasting/cloning/cutting/deleting a node, or changing the node orders.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Manage_Your_Portals.Manage_Pages">Manage pages</link>
          </emphasis> provides you step-by-step instructions to create a new page by using <emphasis role="bold">Page Creation Wizard</emphasis> or <emphasis role="bold">Page Manager,</emphasis> to edit/delete a page and to manage types of page navigations.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Manage_Your_Portals.Manage_Applications">Manage applications</link>
          </emphasis> represents actions which can be done on applications inside a portal and a Desktop.</para>
      </listitem>
 </itemizedlist>
 </partintro>
</para>
</section>
